name: WPHobby Addons for Elementor
author: wphobby

sections.description:
WPHobby Addons for Elementor includes pre-made templates and sections and design your website to stand out from the crowd.
You can check our elementor widgets on Hasium Demo which is build base on our premium theme Hasium Pro Version

Available Elements

  1. Banner – Banner Widget for your website features. Check demo
  2. Post Grid – List your recent published blog posts. Check demo
  3. Slider Box – Beautiful Sliders with settings of image, text and buttons.Check demo
  4. Mailchimp – Create Mailchimp newsletter mail list for your customers.Check demo
  5. Woocommerce Products – List Woocommerce Products with plugin build-in styles.Check demo
  6. Info Box – Create information boxes using using the built-in styles.Check demo
  7. Justified Gallery – Display Justified image Gallery. Check demo
  8. WPForms – Display WPForms with multiple styles. Check demo

WPHobby Addons for Elementor Pro

Like WPHobby Addons for Elementor Free Version? Here’s you can get more elementor template on Hasium Pro Version and have more features.

sections.installation:
1. Unzip the downloaded zip file.
  2. Upload the plugin folder into the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress site.
  3. Activate WPHobby Addons for Elementor from Plugins page.
sections.faq:
What is the requirements to use WPHobby Addons for Elementor?

Minimum Requirements
WordPress version 4.0 or greater.
Elementor version 1.5 or greater.
PHP version 5.4 or greater.

Recommended Requirements

Latest version of WordPress.
Latest version of Elementor.
PHP 5.4 or greater.
